page.title: 06Clubs and Activities.
page.content: Every Wednesday at 5.30 there is Youth Club at Goatacre Village Hall or on the field next to it. When we arrive we give our money in, then if the weather is good we play rounders. If the weather is bad we play skittles. There is sometimes bingo with a prize for the winner. There is a tuck shop where we can buy penny sweets. There is a drawing competition and a raffle. The children come from Hilmarton, Goatacre, Spirthill and other smaller places nearby. Another activity is cricket practice. It is held every Saturday in the summer unless the weather is bad. It starts at 10.30 and ends at 12.30. Those of us without our own kit use the Clubs.We practice batting, bowling and fielding and then we have a game.About 18 people come, from places like Goatacre, Calne and Spirthill.
